abstract: interview with rockstar husqvarna rider michael mosiman .
article: this rookie is excited for his first supercross seasonwith four top 20s and two top 10s in the 2017 ama lucas oil pro motocross championships , michael mosiman has shown that he has the raw speed to hang with the fast dudes . but , what we are all wondering is if he has the determination and fortitude to make a run for a supercross championship . we can say that he has a fantastic attitude and is a likeable young man with a lot of promise . his optimism needs to hold out since he has n't even earned his ricky carmichael 's road to supercross points in the arenacross series yet .

he plans to race the first round in january , and if all goes according to plan , he should get the points he needs . if he does n't finish as well as he hoped , he still has a few more ax rounds before the 250sx east coast class starts . michael mosimansean klingermichael mosimansean klingermichael mosimansean klingermichael mosimansean klingermichael mosimansean klingermichael mosimansean klingermichael mosimansean klingerthis rookie is excited for his first supercross seasonwith four top 20s and two top 10s in the 2017 ama lucas oil pro motocross championships , michael mosiman has shown that he has the raw speed to hang with the fast dudes .

but , what we are all wondering is if he has the determination and fortitude to make a run for a supercross championship . we can say that he has a fantastic attitude and is a likeable young man with a lot of promise . his optimism needs to hold out since he has n't even earned his ricky carmichael 's road to supercross points in the arenacross series yet . he plans to race the first round in january , and if all goes according to plan , he should get the points he needs . if he does n't finish as well as he hoped , he still has a few more ax rounds before the 250sx east coast class starts .
